name: Coinnect - Win Real Money!
description:
Download Now! Coinnect™ is an awesome money winning game and a coin match app where you can win real money prizes, gift cards and more! Over 1500+ 5-star reviews! Get unlimited coins for 1 month!

Coinnect™ is an addictively fun coin matching game and match 3 puzzle for all ages. This money winning game puts your skills to the test! Play against yourself in Free Play, or in a Contest or Tournament Play against other players to win money prizes, gift prizes and earn money online in this gift card game! Many players earn over $10 a day! Entry fees start from $1. You can withdraw your money at any time, and play even on the go!

MATCH THE COINS & WIN CASH PRIZES
The board in this connect puzzle game is filled with coins of 6 different colors. Swipe your finger across 3 (or more!) adjacent coins of the same color to collect them and score points. Match coins diagonally, horizontally, and vertically— or even a combination of directions to win higher scores. If you show your best coin match skills and collect points to level up in this match 3 puzzle, you will have the unique chance to win money prizes and real cash!

FINALLY, A GAME TO WIN REAL MONEY
There are tons of games out there that you play to earn money for the developers! Now, you are finally enjoying a game where you can earn money for yourself. Just showcase your skills in this match 3 puzzler and enjoy real cash prizes.

ENTER TOURNAMENTS
• Enter the tournament for free to get a chance to win a gift card
• At the end of the month, we will randomly select three winners out of the top 20 players
• The more credits you earn the more chances you have to win real prizes

COMPETE IN CONTESTS
With the Coinnect™ match 3 puzzle game, you'll get to enter the most challenging and fun contests! Join as many contests as you want, and get a chance to earn money online and win money prizes instantly when you win!
• Enter each contest for a small fee
• Compete against other players in multiple contests
• The top player within each contest wins the cash prize!

COINNECT FEATURES:
- A highly addictive match 3 puzzle & money winning game
- Free to play against yourself or others & improve your score
- Get ready to join tournaments or contest plays
- Win real money & gift cards every month
- Use a prism coin (in-app purchase) to link sets of different colors and score points more quickly (Free -Play only)
- Additional levels to explore in free play — hone your skills as the time gets shorter and points get higher

Thousands of users have already been entertained and had the opportunity to earn great cash prizes.
Download now for free and start your quest for the biggest cash reward.

Questions? Contact us at support@coinnectapp.net for support.
